description: Triangle of central factorial numbers T(2n,2n-2k), k >= 0, n >= 1 (in Riordan's notation).
references: D. Dumont, Interpretations combinatoires des nombres de Genocchi, Duke Math. J., 41 (1974), 305-318.
J. Riordan, Combinatorial Identities, Wiley, 1968, p. 217, Table 6.2(a).
R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 5.8.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..100 of triangle, flattened
F. Alayont and N. Krzywonos, Rook Polynomials in Three and Higher Dimensions, 2012. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 02 2013
maple: A036969 := proc(n,k) local j; 2*add(j^(2*n)*(-1)^(k-j)/((k-j)!*(k+j)!),j=1..k); end; # Gives rows of triangle in reversed order
prog: (Haskell)a008957 n k = a008957_tabl !! (n-1) (k-1)a008957_row n = a008957_tabl !! (n-1)a008957_tabl = map reverse a036969_tabl-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 18 2013
crossrefs: Essentially same as A036969. Cf. A008955.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
